REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C T f5261 reute r f BC-SPAIN-TO-SUSPEND-LEMO 03-17 0058

TEXT.TITLE: SPAIN TO SUSPEND LEMON EXPORTS FROM THURSDAY
TEXT.BODY: Spain's citrus management committee said it was suspending lemon exports from Thursday in view of the likelihood of new European Community tariffs. A committee spokesman said the body would meet next week to review the situation and decide whether to lift the suspension. Reuter
